short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quik-Lead Places Lead Extension provides details on businesses within Google Maps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "Quik-Lead Places Lead" - a versatile tool that streamlines the process of fetching comprehensive details about Google Places and converting them into a user-friendly CSV format.

Effortless Data Retrieval: With just a few clicks, you can search for any place on Google Maps and retrieve essential information such as name, address, phone number, website, rating, reviews, and more.
Customization: Tailor your search criteria to extract specific fields, ensuring the data is relevant to your needs.
CSV Conversion: The tool efficiently converts collected data into a well-organized CSV format, compatible with applications like Excel and Google Sheets.
Time-Saving: No more manual data entry â€“ our tool automates the process, saving you time and effort.
Data Accuracy: You can trust that the information is up-to-date and accurate, sourced directly from Google's trusted database.
User-Friendly: Our intuitive interface ensures users of all technical backgrounds can navigate the tool with ease.

Business Owners: Gather data on competitors, partners, and potential locations to make informed decisions and enhance business strategies.
Travelers: Plan trips with precision by accessing key details of hotels, restaurants, attractions, and more at your chosen destination.
Researchers: Simplify data collection for academic or market research projects with accurate and structured information.
Marketers: Streamline market analysis and outreach efforts by compiling contact information and reviews of relevant businesses.


The "Quik-Lead Places Lead" is the ultimate tool for harnessing Google Places data, offering structured information at your fingertips. Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to a more efficient and data-driven approach. Try it now!
